text:
DiamondHead | Full-time Software Engineers / Project Manager | ONSITE | VISA | Sapporo, Japan

Diamondhead powers a number of sites, stores, studios and technologies in Japan. While we have offices across Japan, we are looking to expand our developer office in Sapporo.

Relaxed working environment with fun loving people. Application page is in Japanese, but English speaking candidates are more than welcomed.

Sapporo is the fifth largest city in Japan. Famous for good food, nature, and winter sports.

* Application Developer - PHP & Laravel or Ruby & Rails/Sinatra or Rust

* Frontend Developer - ES6, Vue.js, CSS

* DevOps - AWS Stack, CloudFormation, Docker, Go, Kubernetes

Apply at -> http://diamondhead.jp/recruit/recruit_detail.php
